subject: Re: Iterate through a hashref using XML::Simple (real post)
body:
olson.ray@gmail.com \u5199\u9053:

> 
> The a sample of the contents of the XML file is found below: Notice
> that I've hardcode the first reference to Rejected Records by using
> [0]. Well I need to know how of these there are in the hashref $ref so
> I can iterate through.

Hello,
Since you've used Data::Dumper you can dump the hash reference to check 
its structure by clear way.like,

print Dumper $ref;

good luck!

--
